# Smart Agent Alliance

> Real estate coaching and training platform helping agents build sustainable businesses through proven systems, lead generation strategies, and community support.

## About

Smart Agent Alliance provides comprehensive training and resources for real estate professionals. Founded by Doug and Karrie Smart, the platform offers coaching programs, business building strategies, and a supportive community for agents at all experience levels.

## Key Topics

- Real Estate Agent Training
- Lead Generation Systems
- Business Building Strategies
- eXp Realty Partnership
- Agent Coaching Programs
- Revenue Share Education
- Marketing Strategies
- Client Acquisition

## Primary Content

### Blog Categories
- Business Growth: Strategies for scaling your real estate business
- Lead Generation: Proven systems for consistent lead flow
- Marketing: Digital and traditional marketing techniques
- Agent Success: Mindset, productivity, and career development
- eXp Realty: Information about the eXp model and partnership

### Core Pages
- Homepage: Overview of Smart Agent Alliance mission and offerings
- Blog: Educational articles and industry insights
- About: Team information and company background

## Contact

- Website: https://smartagentalliance.com
- Email: info@smartagentalliance.com

## Technical Details

- Built with: Next.js 16, React 19, TypeScript
- Hosting: Cloudflare Pages
- CMS: WordPress (headless)
- Images: Cloudflare Images CDN

## Sitemap

https://smartagentalliance.com/sitemap.xml

## Robots

https://smartagentalliance.com/robots.txt
